        have h₄ : ‖z‖ ^ 2 = ‖z‖ * ‖z‖ := by
          simp [pow_two]
        have h₅ : ‖z‖ * ‖z‖ > 1 := by
          nlinarith
        have h₆ : ‖z‖ ^ 10 ≥ ‖z‖ ^ 2 := by
          apply pow_le_pow_right
          · nlinarith [norm_nonneg z]
          · nlinarith
        have h₇ : ‖z‖ ^ 9 ≥ ‖z‖ ^ 2 := by
          apply pow_le_pow_right
          · nlinarith [norm_nonneg z]
          · nlinarith
        have h₈ : ‖z‖ ^ 2 ≥ 0 := by
